tossup_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three quantities that are considered state functions: 1) Enthalpy; 2) Heat; 3) Volume.
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following solutions, when mixed one-to-one, will exhibit the smallest deviation from Raoult's [rah-oolt’s] law?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Pentane and water
X) Pentane and hexane
Y) Chloroform and acetone
Z) Water and ethanol
